I quite enjoy the concept of a single player experience in Counter Strike, and i enjoy Condition Zero. Its not a mind-blowing adaptation to the series, but its fun for people who are looking for a more casual, solitary, Counter Strike experience.
turns out gaben hacked this game watch out he wants your undies
I thought this was cs 1.6 with more detailed textures but it isn't and I like it, its unique.

Great game really recommend I'd say deleted scenes is better but this was really good

Condition Zero，可看作是Counter-Strike系列旗下一个被遗忘的子品牌，网游CSOL就是基于本作来开发的。CZ是CS1.6的增强版，重置的人物与枪械模型，更多精美地图场景，独有的任期挑战模式与单人战役剧情。但时至今日看来，这款游戏几乎就已经被CSGO全面替代了，多人服务器里的玩家也寥寥无几。除单人模式值得一试以外，游戏整体上没有什么特别亮眼的优点或明显的缺点，CZ作为CS系列的一员，最终也会随着一代人的记忆成为时代的眼泪。
no tak, to jest taki cs, taki specyficzny
CS 1.6 with multiplayer and a campaign.
CS 1.6 gameplay but much easier, medium is highly easy to beat. The bot AI is still pretty good, so matches are semi-realistic. A solid title when bored but not for everyone. 83%
